definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: The patient was treated with surgery and adjuvant radiotherapy followed by systemic chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 於腫瘤摘除術後輔以放射治療及化學治療。

sentences.english: Should she give up the baby and concentrate on medical treatment?
sentences.chinese: 她應該放棄小孩而接受乳癌化學治療？
我不想再一次接受化學治療。

sentences.english: Seven out of 30 patients received post-radiotherapy adjuvant chemotherapy .
sentences.chinese: 其中有7位病人同時接受了術後輔助化學治療。

sentences.english: There are many choices of chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 化學治療的可選方案有很多。
